scripts.build: npx concurrently "npm run server build" "npm run client build:v"
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run client start" "npm run server start"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run client dev" "npm run server dev" "npm run shared dev"
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.i:all: npm i && npm -w ./packages/server i  && npm -w ./packages/client i
